headline: Live Nation Entertainment Announces Launch Of Convertible Senior Notes Offering
summary: Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (NYSE: LYV) (the "company") today announced that it intends to offer, subject to market and other conditions, $1.0 billion in aggregate principal amount of convertible senior notes due 2030 (the "Convertible Notes"). The company intends to use the net proceeds from the Convertible Notes offering (i) to finance the repurchase of a portion of its 2.00% convertible senior notes due 2025 (the "existing convertible notes") in one or more separate and individually negot
